channel.title: Error Help please
channel.description:
Yeah well this is probably stupid question but my server was fine yesterday and now when I went to run it today I get this error in my run command prompt. [code]online Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: "8 Thief" at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(NumberFormatException. java:48) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Integer.java:458) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Integer.java:499) at NPCHandler.loadNPCList(NPCHandler.java:2106) at NPCHandler.<init>(NPCHandler.java:546) at server.main(server.java:112)[/code]
My server compiles fine. Btw base is a delta if that has anything to do with anything
Still getting the error and I removed everything in npcdrops. So don't say I didn't put a space instead of tab because my npcdrops is blank and that is the only cfg file i edited.

item.title: Error Help please
item.dc:creator: @Keegan1 Keegan_
item.description:
@Keegan1 wrote:

nope still getting error.

Read full topic

item.title: Error Help please
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

In the npc drops file, you may have put a single space where a tab is needed.

Read full topic
